name: onecolor
description: Javascript color object with implicit color space conversions. Supports RGB, HSV, HSL and CMYK with alpha channel.

scripts.one-color-all: rollup -c rollup.config.js index.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --in-source-map OUT.js.map --source-map one-color-all.map OUT.js > one-color-all.js; rm OUT.*
scripts.one-color: rollup -c rollup.config.js minimal.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --in-source-map OUT.js.map --source-map one-color.map OUT.js > one-color.js; rm OUT.*
scripts.build: npm run one-color && npm run one-color-all
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run build && TEST_BUNDLES=true npm test && bash -c 'git add one-color{-all,}.{js,map}'
scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run build && TEST_BUNDLES=true npm run coverage
